content: You earned the mic drop — maybe 20 mic drops! And the paranoia — you earned that, too. If you’re not looking over your shoulder, you should be.P.S. Xi and I go way back. Sent your article to him. Said his team prepared him with a similar list plus the most-electoral-votes-ever story. Xi is intelligent and well-read; so he doesn’t think Trump will ‘get' him.
